Posts.Content: On 4/22/2009 dove111 wrote: I was on arimidex for 3 years and after having all kinds of side affects decided quality of life was more important than being sick all the time.  I have gained 45 lbs., and haven't lost anything after three weeks of weight watchers, in fact I gained 3 lbs.  Has anyone else had this issue and has anyone stopped treatment early due to side affects?   cindy   Hi, I visited my oncologist today And he has changed me from tam (after 2 years) to armidex, My first thought was I hope none of the side effects are weight gain as I have recently been on a diet and lost 21 pounds, and what do I see,when I look up side effects, weight gain! I feel like screaming!  Well, its not going to happen, I have about 6 months supply of tam upstairs and if I gain more than 3 pound on armidex, its out, gone! I will let you know xx
Posts.Title: Arimidex and side affects
